name: .SME File Extension
summary: Learn about .SME files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: An SME file is a backup file created by Samsung backup programs, such as Kies and Smart Switch. It stores an archive of backup data for your mobile phone, which includes short text (SMS) messages and memos. SME files are similar to .SBU backup files.

content: Samsung Kies software comes bundled with Samsung phones. The SME file can be viewed in Kies and imported into a Samsung mobile device that is supported by the Kies application. Samsung Smart Switch is also available to restore and backup data in Samsung mobile phones. Smart Switch is available for Windows, macOS, and Android.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
